scripts.dev: yarn setup:deps && yarn build:tsc && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cross-env DEBUG=app yarn dev:server" "yarn dev:client"
scripts.dev:ipfs:preview: yarn setup:deps && yarn build:tsc && yarn build:dev:webpack && yarn build:dev:ipfs && cross-env IPFS=true DEBUG=app yarn dev:server
scripts.build:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn setup:deps && yarn build:tsc && yarn build:release:webpack && yarn build:release:ipfs
scripts.build:release:webpack: cd client && cross-env SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --config ./webpack.config.js && cd ../
